Board - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Game
define the Board as Item[][] 0 = 0 side of the cell are free 1 = 1 side of the cell is free 2 = 2 sides of the cell is free 3 = 3 sides of the cell is free 4 = all sides of the cell are free 9 = the item is black 7 = the cell is null
